hero.name: hero
hero.title: Pick an emoji, get pixel art
hero.description: Turn your keyboard emoji into pixel art; we credit you and timestamp it in the global keyboard‑emoji archive.
hero.tip: Sign in to generate and join the live feed

gallery.name: gallery
gallery.title: Emoji Live Feed
gallery.description: New emoji pixel art goes to the front. Generate now to claim the top spot.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: Get started in 30s
usage.description: Browse → Sign in → Type → Generate & share pixel art → Credit & time → Archive & index

items.title: Browse the live feed
items.description: See the latest emoji pixel art and the pace of top placement.

items.title: Sign in
items.description: Use your account; your creator credit uses this identity and handles credits.

items.title: Paste or type an emoji (from your keyboard)
items.description: Join the global emoji collection; every entry becomes pixel art with source and time.

items.title: Generate & share
items.description: After generating, your work jumps to the front; download, copy link, or share.

items.title: Credit & time
items.description: We automatically add creator credit and timestamp so your creation is properly recorded.

items.title: Archive & index
items.description: Your work is added to the global keyboard‑emoji archive; searchable by platform, region, time, and code.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Built for emoji to pixel art
feature.description: Creation, exposure, credit, and provenance—focused on emoji

items.title: Live top placement
items.description: Every emoji pixel art generation appears at the very front for instant feedback.

items.title: Global collection
items.description: Collect emojis from iOS/Android/Windows/macOS and regional keyboards, cataloged as pixel art and continuously updated.

items.title: Creator credit & time
items.description: Every work carries creator credit and a timestamp so attribution is clear.

items.title: Searchable provenance
items.description: Search by platform, region, time, and code; each record includes source and time.

items.title: Commercial use
items.description: Personal and commercial use allowed (see terms).

items.title: Credits-based
items.description: Spend credits to generate; upgrade or buy packs for more.

faq.name: faq
faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Sign‑in, feed, credit & archive, and credits

items.title: Do I need to sign in?
items.description: Yes. Sign in to generate and appear in the Emoji Live Feed; your creator credit uses your account identity.

items.title: How do I get to the top?
items.description: Every generation jumps to the front; positions shift as new works arrive—fair, time‑ordered placement.

items.title: Can I use creations commercially?
items.description: Yes. Personal and commercial use allowed; see Terms for details.

items.title: Are creations public by default?
items.description: Yes, public in the feed; hide/delete isn’t available yet.

items.title: How do credits work?
items.description: Each generation spends credits; upgrade or buy credit packs for more, see the pricing page for details.

items.title: How do we collect emojis from all keyboards?
items.description: We run a global emoji collection: convert emojis from iOS/Android/Windows/macOS and regional keyboards into pixel art and record source/time; entries go into a searchable, traceable archive.

cta.name: cta
cta.title: Generate your emoji pixel art now
cta.description: Sign in, pick a rare emoji, and claim the top spot.

brand.title: PIXELART
brand.description: Turn emoji into pixel art. Sign in to generate and appear in the Emoji Live Feed; personal and commercial use allowed. Join the global emoji collection with source/time recorded.
